name: Legion of Super Heroes: Tyroc Quiz | Legion of Super-Heroes | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Troy Stewart.

	Tyroc first appeared in 'Superboy' #216. After years of denying writers the "ok" to add a black Legion member, DC Comics finally changed its policy in 1976.

Earth.

	Tyroc resides on Marzal Island, which is off the coast of Africa on planet Earth.  Marzal Island is inhabited by descendants of intended 18th slaves who revolted from a slave ship and settled there.

questions.text: The Legion member known as Tyroc was given that name by the citizens of his homeland, Marzal Island.  In their language, what does the word "Tyroc" mean?
questions.explanation:
Scream of the Devil.

	"Scream of the Devil" is meant to describe Tyroc's employment of various loud vocal sounds he uses to activate his numerous and varied powers.

questions.text: Before joining the Legion, Tyroc was the resident superhero on his native home of Marzal Island.  What is unique about Marzal Island?
questions.correct: It exists in another dimension most of the time
options: It is surrounded by an impenetrable force field
It is formed from a portion of the previously sunken Atlantis
questions.explanation:
It exists in another dimension most of the time.

	Like the fabled Brigadoon, Marzal Island transports to another dimension for 200 years at a time, returning to Earth's dimension for short periods. Tyroc's people are technologically advanced, and very unwelcoming to outsiders.

questions.text: In Tyroc's second appearance, his impending membership into the Legion was challenged by a recently rejected applicant.  Who was this applicant?
questions.explanation:
Absorbancy Boy.

	Absorbancy Boy sought to show the Legion they were making the wrong choice,  but Tyroc defeated him in the end.  Absorbancy Boy would eventually join the Legion years later, using the code name Earth-Man.

questions.text: After three appearances in 1976, Tyroc is next seen when Lightning Lad and Saturn Girl get married (1978).  What role does he have in this adventure?
questions.explanation:
Monitor Duty.

	Tyroc receives the random pick for monitor duty, while all other Legionnaires actively participate in the adventure revolving around the Time Trapper. After over a year of not being seen, he's "benched" to appearing in just a few panels in this giant size adventure.

questions.text: Tyroc returns to Marzal in his final adventure in the Legion's original continuity.  Which two fellow Legionnaire accompany him, and almost end up trapped there?
questions.explanation:
Shadow Lass and Dawnstar.

	Marzal is once again sliding into its other dimension.  Tyroc opts to stay with his people and resigns full time Legion membership.  'Legion of Super Heroes' vol. 2 #263-#265 (1980)

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT one of the numerous effects that Tyroc has been shown to be capable of, using his sonic screams?
questions.explanation:
Limb Regeneration.

	His screams can also achieve plant manipulation, vertigo, transmutation, pyrokinesis and explosions, among other accomplishments.

questions.text: In the Legion's "5YL" (five year later) continuity, Tyroc returns to help the Subs overthrow the Dominators and fight off a Khund invasion.  After this time is over, Tyroc finds himself in what new position?
options: Leader of the Legion of Substitute Heroes
Administrator of the RJ Brande estate
questions.explanation:
President of New Earth.

	After working directly under President Jacques (Invisible Kid II) Foccart, Tyroc serves as Earth's Vice President, before officially taking over as President of New Earth.

questions.text: In the Legion "Retroboot" continuity, Tyroc returns to full time membership and demonstrates a more refined mastery of his abilities. With the advent of DC's 2011 relaunch (New 52), Tyroc is initially stranded where?
questions.explanation:
21st century Earth.

	Because of a Time Bubble malfunction, Tyroc (along with Chameleon Girl, Tellus, Gates, Timber Wolf, Wildfire and Dawnstar) is trapped in the past.  In the Legion's 31st century timeline, these seven are believed to have been killed in a Time Bubble accident.
